description: [``botocore``] This release adds new API to cancel flow executions.
[``botocore``] Amazon Connect Service Rules API update: Added OnContactEvaluationSubmit event source to support user configuring evaluation form rules.
[``botocore``] Documentation only update to address Amazon ECS tickets.
[``botocore``] AWS Kendra now supports configuring document fields/attributes via the GetQuerySuggestions API. You can now base query suggestions on the contents of document fields.
[``botocore``] This release will improve resource level transparency in applications by discovering previously hidden resources.
[``botocore``] Amazon Sagemaker Autopilot supports training models with sample weights and additional objective metrics.
